properties.description:
The trigger runs the pipeline PL_KHCDE_SAP_KEYSTONE_MASTER_POOL_LOAD at 14:45 UTC to extract data from /BIC/AZPSO01GL00, /BIC/AZPSO02GL00, /BIC/AZPSO06GL00, /BIC/AZPSO07GL00, /BIC/AZPSO08GL00, /BIC/AZPSW06GL00
 and add data into sap_kst_wbs_plan_data_fact, sap_kst_wbs_budget_data_fact, sap_kst_wbs_actual_line_items_fact, sap_kst_wbs_commitment_line_items_fact, sap_kst_wbs_budget_line_items_fact, sap_kst_wbs_without_actual_line_items_fact
